text: Pembroke is a small city in Bryan County, Georgia, United States. The 2020 census found the population to be 2,513. The city is the county seat of Bryan County. Pembroke is about 35 miles west of Savannah, Georgia, and 20 miles south of Statesboro, Georgia. ==References== Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:County seats in Georgia
title: Pembroke, Georgia
